rds.vaadin.beanfaces.impl.introspection

Class AnnotatedBeanFormDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • rds.vaadin.beanfaces.impl.introspection.AnnotatedBeanFormDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormDefinition

    public class AnnotatedBeanFormDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
implements FormDefinition
    Default implementation of using DefaultBeanIntrospector to find out properties. Keeps references on FieldDefinition describing every properties of a form.
    Author:
    Raphael Rougemont
